Workplace is a collaboration between Mplus and Noordenster

It's the exclusive ManpowerGroup partner and license holder for the Manpower brand in multiple CEE countries

Workplace owns companies under the Manpower Brand in 6 countries in the region including Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, Hungary, Serbia and Slovenia.

Alongside Manpower branded companies, Workplace also encompasses MPS Integration, offering advanced outsourcing solutions, as well as Smart Flex, a Croatian based HR services provider.

Workplace is created through Mplus's partnership with the Southeastern Europe' top HR and Advanced Outsourcing service providers.

Workplace owns companies under the Manpower Brand in 6 countries in the region including Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, Hungary, Serbia and Slovenia.

Alongside Manpower branded companies, Workplace also encompasses MPS Integration, offering advanced outsourcing solutions, as well as Smart Flex, a Croatian based HR services provider.

Workplace
Footprint
Workplace Serves Over 1.000 clients spread across its member companies and regions, making the Workplace a leader in HR Services.

Products &
Services
Workplace Offers a tailor-made Comprehensive HR Services Package With Industry Expertise and a strong Client Base

As a group, Workplace expands upon the individual offerings of all member companies to create a one-stop-shop for HR Services

Through state-of-the-art technical solutions and specialized teams with proven HR experience, Workplace pairs clients with the best talent to suit their unique needs

Workplace services offer clients workforce management from start to finish, allowing the client to focus on their core business

Workplace also offers clients research solutions in order to provide a detailed and realistic representation of working conditions on the market even before recruiting begins
